overview: Angel loves nothing more than anal sex. Through her A-Word classes, she educates five willing students in the pleasures of backdoor loving. Beautiful Brazilian bombshell Valery Summer is a star pupil, and Pascal is only too happy to join in the educational fun, ramming his big Belgian banger where the sun doesn’t shine!  Next up is tasty Vicki Peach. She is late for her lesson, but soon catches up on what she’s missed with the help of a randy classroom assistant who knows all there is to know about slipping in the back way!  Then Angel visits a hunky builder at his workplace to study his erection technique. No planning permission is needed, and it’s not only his hat that’s hard as Miss Long gives him a lesson in anal sex he will never forget!  Angel next phones Andy up to invite him and his sexy girlfriend Miss Tiger Benson to her classes in backdoor loving. They get so turned on that they find the nearest alley for a really sleazy shag session.
tagline: Angel loves nothing more than anal sex.
title: The A Word
